jobref.args: -controller-vip sp-lab -Option Execute -cw-version 6.0 -overwrite true -deployment-size singleVM -deployment-size-mem 112000 -deployment-size-cpu 24 -seed-node True -node-type Hybrid -initial-node-count 1 -initial-master-count 1 -disk-mode thin -deployment-option cw_ipv4 -backup-percentage 20 -ovf-options --acceptAllEulas,--skipManifestCheck,--noSSLVerify,--powerOn,--X:injectOvfEnv -ovf-extra-config default -ovf-extra-config-options default,default -host-name cw01 -vm-role 1 -timzone Australia/Brisbane -domain-name snapzilla.local -controller-vip-name ${option.controller-vip} -data-vip-name ${option.controller-vip} -data-vip ${option.controller-vip} -dns-server 10.0.0.138 -ntp-server 10.0.0.138,pool.ntp.org -vnic-options vNIC0,vNIC1 -datastore-1 /dc/datastore/ds4_2TB_SSD -vmware-esx-host /dc/host/c1/10.0.0.111 -vnic-1-network "/dc/network/VM Network" -vnic-2-network /dc/network/data -vnic-0-static static -vnic-0-ip 10.0.0.144 -vnic-0-mask 255.255.255.0 -vnic-0-gateway 10.0.0.138 -vnic-1-static static -vnic-1-ip 10.1.0.244 -vnic-1-mask 255.255.255.0 -vnic-1-gateway 10.0.0.138 -disclaimer "You are permitted, but only because I let you"
jobref.name: CNC - Single Node (2 nic) v2 GOVC Version
